#include<iostream>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<string>
#include<ctype.h>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace std;
int main()
{

  string s;
  int p;
getline(cin,s);
p=s.length();
for(int i=0;i<p;i++)
  {

   if((s[i]=='a')||(s[i]=='e')||(s[i]=='o')||(s[i]=='i')||(s[i]=='u'))
        {

        i=i+2;
        cout<<s[i];
        }
        else
         cout<<s[i];

         }
        // cout<<"\n";

      }
